name: Quanta Cloud
body:
**NOTE : THIS TEXT IS NOT FINISHED.  IT IS CURRENTLY A DRAFT UNTIL DECEMBER**

Rules : 
- THIS POLICY WILL BE NEVER MODIFIED (excepted to clarify or add a rule).
- ALL MEMBERS AT KANTUM TECHNOLOGIES MUST COMPLY THIS POLICY
- THIS POLICY MUST BE APPLIED ON ALL PROJECTS OF KANTUM TECHNOLOGIES AND THE KANTUM TECHNOLOGIES GROUP
- NO RULE CAN CONTRADICT AN ANOTHER RULE

Member : a future salaried of Kantum Technologies

User : a person behind its computer, not a user of Quanta Cloud

#Technical

### Coding rules

- All the project's servers must run on BSD or Linux.
- Only free softwares can be installed on project's servers.
- All project's must be coded from zero by ourselves.

### Security

- Passwords must be communicated in email on ProtonMail mail servers
- Sensible/Private datum of Kantum Technologies or its projects must be sent in email on ProtonMail

#Ethical

##Money

You can make a donation for the servers, the team/enterprise, or for the conferences.
We are not building this project to make money, but to make a Internet which respects users privacy.

##Technical

### Crytography

- The key length must be free

### Opensource

- All projects must be published in :
 - LGPL version 3
 - Or GPL version 3
 - Or Apache License version 2
- Libraries must be published in Apache License version 2.0

## Privacy

### User's privacy

- No advertisement authorized
- Datum must be encrypted at the client side

### Government

- We are not allowed to give datum to any government
- If we must do it, we have to contact the user(s) concerned before

### Member's privacy

- The private informations of members must be encrypted with the Paul Feuvraux's private key (RSA - 4096) and stocked on the group server

# Internal social system

### Democracy

- All decisions must be approved by vote
- All members must vote
- For doubt decisions, we can propose referendum to have the opinion of the users
- Any member can propose a referendum at any moment


# Global

- Smile with your best mood to write the best code and make a cool cohesion between the Quanta Cloud's members.


# Contact

If you think that there's a misunderstanding in a rule, do not hesisate to [contact us](quantacloud@protonmail.ch)
